env_menu.welcome_message: Welcome! Please choose an option by typing the corresponding number.

env_deck_browser.welcome_message: Here you can see a list of your saved decks. To interact with a specific deck, select its [magenta][ID][/magenta]. Or [magenta][0] Return[/magenta] to the main menu.
env_deck_browser.no_deck_found: [bold magenta]No Deck found. To return to the main menu, press enter.[/bold magenta]
env_deck_browser.selected_deck: You can [magenta][0] Return[/magenta] to the Deck Browser, [magenta]\[delete][/magenta] the deck, or [magenta]\[edit][/magenta] the deck.

env_deck_creator.welcome_message: In the Deck Creator, you can create your own custom flashcard decks.
env_deck_creator.saving_deck_instructions: Would you like to [magenta][0] return[/magenta] to the main menu or [magenta][1] save[/magenta] your deck?
env_deck_creator.create_card_instructions: Enter a term and its definition to create your flashcards. Press [magenta][Enter][/magenta] on an empty term to finish your deck.

env_play.welcome_message: Choose the game mode. Or [bold magenta][0] Return[/bold magenta] to the main menu.
env_play.choose_deck_for_game: To select the deck you'd like to play with, choose its [magenta][ID][/magenta]. Or [magenta][0] Return[/magenta] to the main menu.

env_study_mode.welcome_message: Study Mode is a relaxed way to learn without time limits or penalties.
env_study_mode.study_mode_instructions: To interact with a specific deck, select its [bold magenta][ID][/bold magenta]. Or [bold magenta][0] Return[/bold magenta] to the main menu.

game_quiz.welcome_message: Your goal is to match 15 cards correctly. You have only 3 chances, so be careful.
game_quiz.quiz_instructions: If you want to exit the game at any time, type [magenta]\[exit_game][/magenta].

game_study_mode.instructions: Use [bold magenta][Enter] to flip cards[/bold magenta] and memorize terms. Type [bold magenta][1] to switch cards[/bold magenta], [bold magenta][2] to edit card[/bold magenta] or type [bold magenta][0] to exit[/bold magenta].

game_guess_definition.welcome_message: Your goal is to choose the right answer from the displayed options. You have only 3 chances, so be careful.
game_guess_definition.quiz_instructions: Enter only the letter of your chosen answer (a,b,c,d) - without ')'. If you want to exit the game at any time, type [magenta]\[exit_game][/magenta].

game_survival.welcome_message: This is the endless mode. You have only 3 chances, so be careful.
game_survival.survival_instructions: If you want to exit the game at any time, type [magenta]\[exit_game][/magenta].

log_messages.return_to_the_deck_browser: [bold magenta]To return to the Deck Browser, press enter.[/bold magenta]
log_messages.return_to_the_main_menu: [bold magenta]To return to the main menu, press enter.[/bold magenta]
log_messages.enter_deck_name: Enter the name of your deck:
log_messages.game_mode_not_available: [magenta]This game mode is not available in this version.[/magenta]
log_messages.change_in_card: [bold magenta]The change will only be visible after reloading the study mode.
log_messages.cannot_save_empty_deck: You cannot save an empty deck. Please add at least one card.
log_messages.missing_definition: Please provide a definition for your term. You can only save or exit during the 'term' input stage.
log_messages.value_error: Value Error: Please enter a valid term, such as 'black.'
log_messages.card_updated: The card has been successfully updated.
